name: library-management-system
description: Library Management System with modern dashboard

scripts.build: cd frontend && npm ci && mkdir -p ../build && cp -r . ../build && echo 'Frontend build completed' && cd .. && npm ci --prefix backend
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd backend && npm run dev"
scripts.install-all: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install

author: Gautam Nimase
